availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John W. Barrett (Barren County, Kentucky, farmer and deputy sheriff)

body.p: Barren County, Kentucky, farmer and deputy sheriff. Virginia native. Married to Elizabeth F. Barrett. Father of Lilian Barrett. Farmer in Barren County, Kentucky in 1860. Owned nine enslaved persons in Barren County in 1860. Deputy sheriff in Barren County in 1864.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Barren County, Glasgow/District 1, p. 783.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Barren County, District 1, p. 49B.
KYR-0001-004-0406.
